titles.title: Ensuring Accurate Postal Rates Act
Ensuring Accurate Postal Rates Act
To direct the Postal Regulatory Commission to review and modify market-dominant ratemaking system rules as a result of the enactment of the USPS Fairness Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary:
Ensuring Accurate Postal Rates Act
This bill directs the Postal Regulatory Commission to review and potentially modify the market-dominant ratemaking system rules in light of the USPS Fairness Act, which canceled unpaid U.S. Postal Service obligations.
